title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

items.content_html:
“Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” - Albert Einstein

Happy new year everyone! Go watch the fireworks (stay safe), eat, drink, be merry, and step forward to a new and hopefully better year :D
